Key Match Events: Mohammad Amir took two wickets in Pakistan's win over New Zealand in the second T20I.
Pre-Game Insights: Mohammad Amir acknowledged that there was pressure on him due to his comeback after four years.
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Amir said he felt more fit and energetic now compared to when he retired.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mohammad Amir credits Babar Azam and other seniors for making his comeback comfortable.
Others: Mohammad Amir is the only player in the Pakistan squad in this series to have won not one but two ICC titles as a player.
